snippet: Provisions went into effect late last month requiring airlines and ticket agents to list all mandatory taxes and fees in published airfares and to disclose baggage fees when tickets are purchased.
abstract: Provisions went into effect late last month requiring airlines and ticket agents to list all mandatory taxes and fees in published airfares and to disclose baggage fees when tickets are purchased.
lead_paragraph: Provisions went into effect late last month requiring airlines and ticket agents to list all mandatory taxes and fees in published airfares and to disclose baggage fees when tickets are purchased.

headline.main: What Is the Airfare, With Fees? Now You Will Know
